title: Linking Salesforce Data Migration Scorecard to External Resources and Apps
excerpt: The Data Migration Object scorecard is designed to keep track of your Salesforce data migration project and can serve as a launchpad to link to supporting data assets
content_markdown:
The Data Migration Scorecard is designed to keep track of your Salesforce data migration project and can serve as a launchpad to link to supporting data assets including but not limited to:

- ETL jobs
- Data Pipeline Services
- Documentation

When linking to an external resource the Status is transformed into a clickable URL.

![](https://datatoolspro.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/image-5-1024x576.png)

## Update Status and Link to an External URL:

1. Once you have [added your source object](https://datatoolspro.com/tutorials/salesforce-migration-field-mapping-details/#addsourceobjects), click the “Edit” icon on the right denoted by a pencil icon.
2. In the edit record screen, you can update the status and add URLs to any external resource.

![](https://datatoolspro.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/image-15-1024x741.png)

**PRO TIP:** To ensure nothing is missed, we recommend mining your source database to fetch all distinct values that could be migrated and entering them into the data mapping tool.
